title: Rap battle thread
body: Alright nerds, it's rap battle time. Who wants to get rekt? Give me your best

replies.body:
I get so much pussy they call me a placenta,
My di*k is blowing up... JUST LIKE THE WORLD TRADE CENTRE!!!!!

Oh... the temptation to be a try-hard is so real...

_Senses like Rek'Sai, I now have your location_
_Not even an Ekko ult will save you from desecration_

_Initiating the fight like Zac and his Slingshot_
_Jump right on your face, you were here and now your not_

_And as you recollect your senses at the grey screen_
_You realise that the skills that killed you are so killer mean_

I'm so sorry... I couldn't resist. It's not even good xD

Try hard mode activated
I'm so fly i have arachnophobia
